review: I don't know much about this stuff but we are enjoying movies and programs using it

review: I had to reset my computer due to a hack and lost chromecast....it will now not allow me to re-load
author: darel shea

review: I love the product, my wife and babies find it extremely useful as well, but going in our second year, it has stopped connecting with any wifi connection making it now useless and requiring me to buy another one. Wondering if the 2 years for $35 was worth it or if I should try something else now...
author: cesar m guevara

review: It works great. We have streamed Netflix and concerts with it. Would definitely recommend it.
author: nicky santarelli

review: I don't know exactly how it works, but it does and is an excellent product. It's easy to hook up and start watching. I've used Netflix, HBOgo, and youTube so far and they all work.
author: S. Snow "Telling it how it is."

review: didn't work well in my apartment, kept getting stuck in the middle of viewing.  returned it and got Apple TV, which works great.
